title: bollywood:Farhan Akhtar Suffers Hairline Fracture, Ranveer Singh Breaks Down On Last Day Of 83 & More From Ent
text:
Farhan, whose The Sky is Pink alongside Priyanka Chopra has just released, has been prepping up for the role quite religiously. He has sported a chiselled body and has been practicing air punches for quite some time now. The first look of Toofan was released a couple of days.

Now, as per report on Bollywood Hungama, 20 people were arrested on Friday for they were protesting outside Salman Khan's house. Also, a video which is doing the rounds on social media, a man can be seen standing outside Salman Khan’s house and protesting while warning the actor as well as the makers to stop spreading obscenity in Bigg Boss House.

Don't Miss 231 SHARES 1.3 K SHARES

Remember earlier this year how she had almost forgot she was a part of Spider-Man: Homecoming? And how Jimmy Kimmel poked fun at her? Watch it in the video below.

The 44-year-old actor was in his Tesla, when it ran into the bumper of Los Angeles County Fire Department truck, according to TMZ. Joaquin Phoenix had apparently misjudged a right turn he was making. That can happen to anyone, right? But how he reacted to the entire incident was a rarity. What he did after that has restored our faith in humanity.

"We shot for five days at the Lord's stadium in London, entering the members only Long Room where no camera ventured before, the dressing rooms and locker rooms, and then (we) stepped out on the balcony where the World Cup was presented to Kapil sir. And guess what? They brought out the real World Cup for Ranveer too. Overwhelmed, he broke down when I shouted 'Cut',” Kabir Khan told Mumbai Mirror in an interview.
